title.narrative: Barapwo Te Dam Spring Protection Project

description.narrative: On December 23, 2016, International Lifeline Fund, in partnership with Water to Thrive, completed the Barapwo Te Dam Spring Protection Project in the Lira district of Northern Uganda to improve water access for 4,100+ beneficiaries from four villages and the nearby University of Lira.
